resources.string: Field not required to be filled
Oops! An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
Oops! Couldn't reach server. Please check your network connection and try again.
Oops! Connection to the server was lost
Oops! A server error has occurred. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later or contact support.
Request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Oops! It looks like you've entered invalid data. Please double-check your input and try again.
Oops! A user with this phone number already exists. Please use a different number or contact support.
This field is required. Please fill it in to proceed.
The password needs to consist of at least 6 characters.
To notify you about your approaching queue, we need permission to show notifications.
Oops! You are already in queue!
Oops! You need at least 4 people in front of you!
Are you sure you want to leave the queue? This action cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to remove a person from the queue? This action cannot be undone.
There is no one in the queue
To join the queue, you need to subscribe
With the subscription, you can easily join the queue online, avoiding the need for physical presence until the start of your riding time. Organize your visits without long waits.
Subscribe once and enjoy unlimited access for the entire riding season without additional payments.
One-time seasonal subscription, no renewal required
Your application is being processed. Please wait!
Your subscription will be activated within a few minutes
There was a problem with the payment. Please check the data and try again.
If the problem persists, contact support.
Your subscription has been successfully submitted!
Congratulations, you can now join the queue!
Please check your internet connection or try again later. If the problem persists, the server may be temporarily unavailable. We apologize for any inconvenience.
